provenanceData.sentence: A fake bomb threat at the Kalispell Walmart Wednesday was initially labeled by law enforcement as swatting incident, where pranksters hijack phone numbers in order to report fake threats to police.
But the bomb threat was actually part of a scam to extort money out of a Montana correctional officer.
